spells.name: Shadow Relection
spells.description: Give a friendly minion +5 Attack.

spells.name: Beam Shock
spells.description: STUN an enemy

spells.name: Phoenix Fire
spells.description: Deal 3 damage to anything.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.description: Deal 2 Damage to ALL characters

spells.name: All Attack
spells.description: 6 units hit all enemy troops

spells.name: All Disarm
spells.description: All of enemy troops will be disarmed for one turn

spells.name: All Poison
spells.description: All of enemy troops will be poisoned for 4 turns

spells.name: All Power
spells.description: It gives a POWER BUFF with 2 units AP increment to all own troops

spells.name: Area Dispel
spells.description: This card, destroys positive BUFFs of enemy troops and negative BUFFs of own troops in a 2*2 square

spells.name: Dispel
spells.description: destroys positive BUFFs of an enemy troop or negative BUFFs of an own troop

spells.name: Empower
spells.description: 2 units are added to AP of an own troop

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: 4 units hit an enemy troop

spells.name: God Strength
spells.description: 4 units are added to AP of own HERO

spells.name: Health With Profit
spells.description: it gives a WEAKNESS BUFF with 6 units HP decrement and two HOLY BUFFs for 3 turns to an own troop

spells.name: HellFire
spells.description: It creates FIERY CELL EFFECT for two turns in a 2*2 square

spells.name: Kings Guard
spells.description: Kills a random enemy MINION around own HERO

spells.name: Lighting Bolt
spells.description: 8 units hit enemy HERO

spells.name: Madness
spells.description: For three turns, it increases AP of a troop 4 units, but disarms it

spells.name: Poison Lake
spells.description: It creates POISON CELL EFFECT for one turn in a 3*3 square

spells.name: Power Up
spells.description: applies a POWER BUFF with 6 units AP increment for an own troop

spells.name: Sacrifice
spells.description: It gives an own MINION a WEAKNESS BUFF with 6 units HP decrement and a POWER BUFF with 8 units AP increment

spells.name: Shock
spells.description: Makes an enemy troop STUN

spells.name: Total Disarm
spells.description: Make an enemy troop DISARM till the end of the game

spells.name: Weakening
spells.description: It gives an enemy MINION a WEAKNESS BUFF with 4 units AP decrement

spells.name: All Attack
spells.description: 6 units hit all enemy troops

spells.name: All Disarm
spells.description: All of enemy troops will be disarmed for one turn

spells.name: All Poison
spells.description: All of enemy troops will be poisoned for 4 turns
